alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 16 at 1:41AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect... * Strong winds of 25 to 35 mph with higher gusts will impact the Islands through Saturday... * TIMING...through Saturday. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 140 VAVEAO ASO FARAILE TESEMA 16 2022 ...Ua iai nei le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O savili malolosi e 25 i le 35 mph, e agi faatautau i taimi, o le a aafia ai pea motu uma o Amerika Samoa... * TAIMI...seia oo i le po Aso Toona`i * AAFIAGA...E ono pauu laau, lelea mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma e faaleagaina foi apa ma taualuga o fale. O savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai le faafoeina o taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi, o lona uiga o savili e 30 i le 40 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u, o loo aafia ai pea le atunu`u. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Fa`amolemole ia e fa`aeteete.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 30 to 40 MPH with higher gusts are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
